long_description: The soft warmth of the REI Greenlake Fleece Hoodie is perfect for a Saturday morning at the farmer's market or relaxing at the end of a busy day. Midweight fleece offers all-conditions warmth; it also wicks moisture and provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Flatlock stitching eliminates abrasion, increases comfort and enhances fit by reducing bulky seams. Thumbhole cuffs let you extend sleeves for more complete coverage and warmth. Finishing touches on the REI Greenlake Fleece Hoodie include a full-zip front, simple drawcord to adjust the hood, and wide cuffs for a comfortable fit at the wrists.
short_description: The soft warmth of the REI Greenlake Fleece Hoodie is perfect for a Saturday morning at the farmer's market or relaxing at the end of a busy day.
